p: The O.forskolei extract from leaves and stem showed promising results in the α-amylase inhibition assay. They almost had the same potential for α-amylase inhibition (72.3 and 78.9 µg/mL, for leaves and corollas extracts, respectively), suggesting that O. forskolei might be effective in slowing down the hydrolysis of polysaccharides [ 45].
